alert.note: Alert for Nemaha; Pawnee; Richardson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 3:25AM CDT until April 20 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Nemaha County in southeastern Nebraska... Richardson County in southeastern Nebraska... Eastern Pawnee County in southeastern Nebraska... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 325 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles south of Pawnee City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Du Bois around 330 AM CDT. Humboldt around 340 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Dawson, Verdon, Stella, Salem, Falls City and Shubert. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
